header.title: Zero Carbon Act Bill Submission Form

questions.title: This is our chance. I'm excited to be submitting on the Zero Carbon Bill because...
questions.description: This is what will come straight after the "Dear Madam / Sir" in your submission. We need to you write something here, because that's what will make it an individual submission, which will get taken more seriously.

questions.title: What process should the Government use to set a new emissions reduction target in legislation?

options.option: The Government sets a 2050 target in legislation now
If the Government sets a 2050 target now, which is the best target for New Zealand?

questions.textbox: NZ (businesses, iwi, communities and households) needs certainty to act fast now.  moreâ€¦

questions.title: How should New Zealand meet its targets?

options.option: Domestic emissions reductions only (including from new forest planting).
